Groups.Group: Internet Security Benchmarks + Red Hat Enterprise Linux 7 Level 1

Advanced.DetectScript: #!/bin/bash RV=0 servicename="daytime-stream" reason="The $servicename is not disabled." rev=$( chkconfig --list $servicename 2>&1 | grep -E -oci "on") if [ ${rev} -eq 0 ];then RV=1 fi if [ $RV -eq 1 ]; then echo "${reason}" >&1 echo "The $servicename should be disabled." >&2 fi exit $RV

Vulnerability.Title: Disable daytime-stream
Vulnerability.Description:
daytime-stream is a network service that responds with the server's current date and time. This service is intended for debugging and testing purposes. It is recommended that this service be disabled.
Note: This content will only provide detection of the security threat or vulnerability. Remediation must be performed manually.
